tool_description: Our public API is free to use. Fetch data about 381 localized languages: locale, language code, language name, unicode flag, and much more.
name: Localized languages
title: Localized languages

api_list.name: Fetch localized languages
api_list.description:
Acknowledge diversity and embrace inclusion. Fetch data about 381 localized languages.

Find more information about localization on [Particular.Cloud](https://particular.cloud/).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://localized-languages1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "localized-languages1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://localized-languages1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "localized-languages1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
